snippet: Many of the dead were agricultural workers in fields, and the southern state of Andhra Pradesh reported 19 deaths across six districts.
abstract: Indian officials say lightning killed at least 28 people during storms that affected southern and eastern parts of country.
lead_paragraph: Many of the dead were agricultural workers in fields, and the southern state of Andhra Pradesh reported 19 deaths across six districts.

headline.main: Lightning Kills at Least 28 as Storms Batter India
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: 28 Are Killed in Lightning Strikes
